original_text: So, people of Israel, this is what the Lord your God wants you to do: You should respect him with fear. You should live in a way that pleases him. Love him and serve him in everything that you think and in everything that you do.
korean_text: 이스라엘아 네 하나님 여호와께서 네게 요구하시는 것이 무엇이냐 곧 네 하나님 여호와를 경외하여 그의 모든 도를 행하고 그를 사랑하며 마음을 다하고 뜻을 다하여 네 하나님 여호와를 섬기고

sentences.original_text: this is what the Lord your God wants you to do
sentences.korean_translation: 이것이 너희 하나님 여호와께서 너희에게 요구하시는 것이다

sentences.original_text: You should respect him with fear
You should live in a way that pleases him
sentences.korean_translation: 너희는 그를 기쁘시게 하는 삶을 살아야 한다

sentences.original_text: and in everything that you do
